# Lung Image Preprocessing

## Introduction

This is my first adventure into Deep learning and Image processing at the same
time. Wish me luck

# Nodule detection

Lets use the LUng Nodule Analysis (LUNA) 2016’s dataset lung nodule images to train a UNET to detect for nodules and apply it to the Grand Challenge.

Idea is taken from [this](https://github.com/booz-allen-hamilton/DSB3Tutorial/blob/master/Tutorial.ipynb) python notebook.

The image files are stored in the .dmc (dicom format)
